thread.title: NEFA’s 2015 Funding Symposium Discount Registration Opens
thread.title_full: NEFA’s 2015 Funding Symposium Discount Registration Opens

title: NEFA’s 2015 Funding Symposium Discount Registration Opens
text:
NEFA’s 2015 Funding Symposium Discount Registration Opens July 01, 2015, 07:00 AM Related: Gerry Egan , National Equipment Finance Association , NEFA 
Early, discount registration is open as of July 1, for NEFA’s 2015 Funding Symposium, October 7-10, in Atlanta, Georgia.The Funding Symposium, to be held this year at the JW Marriott Atlanta Buckhead Hotel, draws lessors, brokers, funding sources, service providers and other commercial equipment finance professionals from around the US and Canada for industry networking, leading edge funding source and service provider exhibits, and focused educational opportunities. “Add in how easy it is to get to Atlanta, and the abundance of great restaurants, clubs and shopping in the upscale Buckhead area where we’ll be and we expect a great turnout for the Symposium” said Gerry Egan, Executive Director of NEFA.“Under the guidance of Conference Chairperson, Bob Hanna, of Weltman, Weinberg & Reis Co., L.P.A., and a sharp team of NEFA Member Volunteers, we’ve drastically expanded the education offerings” Egan said. “This year’s Funding Symposium will offer more education, more exhibitors, more sponsors, and more opportunities to create and cultivate the relationships that build your business and make you money.”Through July 31, the earliest registrants can take advantage of Super Saver registration discounts which is an exceptional value” said Egan. “Early Bird pricing will then follow through the end of August, followed by regular pricing. Of course, people can register right up to and at the event.”The JW Marriott Atlanta Buckhead, home of the 2015 Funding Symposium, is a small, modern, luxury hotel attached to Buckhead’s famed Lennox Square Shopping Mall. The hotel offers a special, discount room rate for NEFA Funding Symposium Attendees.The National Equipment Finance Association (NEFA) is a national association serving small to mid-sized independent equipment finance companies, lessors and brokers. NEFA is a strong association offering enhanced educational programs and premium networking opportunities with broad geographic and industry segment diversity. The mission of NEFA is to provide a forum for members to pursue personal and professional growth and promote ethical business practices through advocacy, networking and industry involvement. For more information, visit: www.NEFAssociation.org . Most Popular
